item.title: Empire Minute 121: Ships at Sea
item.description: While Luke, Leia, and the droids stand, looking out the window of the star cruiser, two escort fighters join the large ship. Slowly, the cruiser turns and moves away into space. Guest commentator: Jason Crane
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 121: Ships at Sea

item.title: Empire Minute 120: Toys Wrapped in Tragedy
item.description: Luke looks down at his hand. A metalized type of bandage has been wrapped around his wrist. The medical droid makes some adjustments in a tiny electronic unit, then pricks each one of Luke's fingers. Guest commentator: Skottie Young
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 120: Toys Wrapped in Tragedy

item.title: Empire Minute 119: Hando
item.description: Lando sits in the pilot's seat as he talks into the comlink. Chewie busily throws a variety of switches in preparation for takeoff. Guest commentator: Chris Eliopoulos
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 119: Hando
item.itunes:summary: Lando sits in the pilot's seat as he talks into the comlink. Chewie busily throws a variety of switches in preparation for takeoff. Guest commentator: Chris Eliopoulos

item.title: Empire Minute 118: Delusions of Grandeur
item.description: Artoo races to a control panel and starts working on a circuit board. Furious, Threepio stands on one leg, yelling. Guest commentator: John Kovalic
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 118: Delusions of Grandeur

item.title: Empire Minute 117: Party Line
item.description: Luke realizes that Vader's ship is very near. He feels resigned to his fate. He senses that he is beaten, more emotionally than physically. Guest commentator: Ian Doescher
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 117: Party Line
item.itunes:summary: Luke realizes that Vader's ship is very near. He feels resigned to his fate. He senses that he is beaten, more emotionally than physically. Guest commentator: Ian Doescher

item.title: Empire Minute 116: Cyborgs Aplenty
item.description: The Wookiee shrugs and pulls back on the light-speed throttle. The sound of the ion engine changes...it is winding up. Faces are tense, expectant. But nothing happens, and the engine goes off. Chewie lets out a frustrated howl. The flak still violently rocks the ship. Guest commentator: Joel Johnson

item.title: Empire Minute 115: The Arm in the Wall
item.description: Leia and Chewie turns to see Luke, bloody and battered, enter the cockpit supported by Lando. Leia jumps up and hugs him while Chewie barks in joyous relief. Guest commentator: Ron Richards
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 115: The Arm in the Wall
item.itunes:summary: Leia and Chewie turns to see Luke, bloody and battered, enter the cockpit supported by Lando. Leia jumps up and hugs him while Chewie barks in joyous relief. Guest commentator: Ron Richards

item.title: Empire Minute 114: Great Line
item.description: Luke hangs by one arm from the crossbar of the weather vane. He slips from the bar and grabs onto the pole of the vane as the Falcon banks toward him. The Falcon positions itself under Luke as Lando moves up through the opening of the hatch. Guest commentator: Doug Benson
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 114: Great Line
item.itunes:summary: Luke hangs by one arm from the crossbar of the weather vane. He slips from the bar and grabs onto the pole of the vane as the Falcon banks toward him. The Falcon positions itself under Luke as Lando moves up through the opening of the hatch. Guest commentator: Doug Benson
item.content:encoded: Luke hangs by one arm from the crossbar of the weather vane. He slips from the bar and grabs onto the pole of the vane as the Falcon banks toward him. The Falcon positions itself under Luke as Lando moves up through the opening of the hatch. Guest commentator: Doug Benson

item.title: Empire Minute 113: Cosmic Operator
item.description: Luke tries to pull himself up on the weather vane but slips back down. He hooks one of his legs around the fragile instruments. All the while, a powerful current of air rushes out at him from the exhaust pipe. Guest commentator: John Champion
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 113: Cosmic Operator
item.itunes:summary: Luke tries to pull himself up on the weather vane but slips back down. He hooks one of his legs around the fragile instruments. All the while, a powerful current of air rushes out at him from the exhaust pipe. Guest commentator: John Champion
item.content:encoded: Luke tries to pull himself up on the weather vane but slips back down. He hooks one of his legs around the fragile instruments. All the while, a powerful current of air rushes out at him from the exhaust pipe. Guest commentator: John Champion

item.title: Empire Minute 112: Sliding to His Manhood
item.description: Unable to hang onto the pipe, Luke tumbles out, emerging at the undermost part of Cloud City. Reaching out desperately, he manages to grab onto on electronic weather vane. Recorded live at the Parkside Lounge, NYC. Guest commentators: Sean Hutchinson and Meredith Woerner
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 112: Sliding to His Manhood

item.title: Empire Minute 111: The Green Cross Code Man
item.description: Vader puts away his sword and holds his hand out to Luke. Recorded live at the Parkside Lounge, NYC. Guest commentators: Kevin Maher and Asterios Kokkinos
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 111: The Green Cross Code Man

item.title: Empire Minute 110: That's Why You Don't Blow Up the Death Star
item.description: Vader's sword comes down across Luke's right forearm, cutting off his hand and sending his sword flying. Guest commentator: John Skrzypek
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 110: That's Why You Don't Blow Up the Death Star
item.itunes:summary: Vader's sword comes down across Luke's right forearm, cutting off his hand and sending his sword flying. Guest commentator: John Skrzypek

item.title: Empire Minute 109: Robots Can Be Funny
item.description: Sparks fly as they duel, Vader gradually forcing Luke backward toward the gantry. Guest commentator: John Skrzypek
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 109: Robots Can Be Funny
item.itunes:summary: Sparks fly as they duel, Vader gradually forcing Luke backward toward the gantry. Guest commentator: John Skrzypek

item.title: Empire Minute 108: Snarky Backpack
item.description: Lando and Leia hold off the troops as the droids get on board with Chewie. As Chewie bounds to the ship the Threepio on his back, Threepio hits his head on the top of the ramp. Guest commentator: John Skrzypek

item.title: Empire Minute 107: Why Not?
item.description: Leia, Lando, Chewie and the droids come round a corner and head for the door to the landing platform. Guest commentator: John Skrzypek
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 107: Why Not?
item.itunes:summary: Leia, Lando, Chewie and the droids come round a corner and head for the door to the landing platform. Guest commentator: John Skrzypek

item.title: Empire Minute 106: Bespin Fatigue
item.description: A large pipe detaches and comes flying at Luke. He deflects it. Sparking wires pull out of the wall and begin to whip at the youth. Guest commentator: John Skrzypek
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 106: Bespin Fatigue
item.itunes:summary: A large pipe detaches and comes flying at Luke. He deflects it. Sparking wires pull out of the wall and begin to whip at the youth. Guest commentator: John Skrzypek

item.title: Empire Minute 105: Star Wars House
item.description: Moving through a tunnellike entrance, Luke cautiously approaches the reactor room. He ignites his sword and moves into the room and toward a large window as Vader enters. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 105: Star Wars House
item.itunes:summary: Moving through a tunnellike entrance, Luke cautiously approaches the reactor room. He ignites his sword and moves into the room and toward a large window as Vader enters. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.content:encoded: Moving through a tunnellike entrance, Luke cautiously approaches the reactor room. He ignites his sword and moves into the room and toward a large window as Vader enters. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle

item.title: Empire Minute 104: Me Skywalker
item.description: Suddenly, Vader attacks so forcefully that Luke loses his balance and falls back into the opening. There is a rumble, and in an instant freezing steam rises to obscure Vader's vision. Vader turns aside and deactivates his sword. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 104: Me Skywalker
item.itunes:summary: Suddenly, Vader attacks so forcefully that Luke loses his balance and falls back into the opening. There is a rumble, and in an instant freezing steam rises to obscure Vader's vision. Vader turns aside and deactivates his sword. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle

item.title: Empire Minute 103: Sullen Lando
item.description: An elevator door slides open and Lando, Leia, and Chewbacca race for a large bay overlooking the East Landing Platform. Just as they arrive, Boba Fett's ship takes off against a cloudy sunset sky. In wild anguish, Chewie howls and starts firing at the ship. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 103: Sullen Lando
item.itunes:summary: An elevator door slides open and Lando, Leia, and Chewbacca race for a large bay overlooking the East Landing Platform. Just as they arrive, Boba Fett's ship takes off against a cloudy sunset sky. In wild anguish, Chewie howls and starts firing at the ship. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle

Just as they arrive, Boba Fett's ship takes off against a cloudy sunset sky. In wild anguish, Chewie howls and starts firing at the ship. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle

item.title: Empire Minute 102: Jiminy Lobot
item.description: Chewie turns on Lando and starts to choke him. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 102: Jiminy Lobot
item.itunes:summary: Chewie turns on Lando and starts to choke him. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.content:encoded: Chewie turns on Lando and starts to choke him. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle

item.title: Empire Minute 101: Meet Me in the Hallway
item.description: Luke ignites his sword in answer. In an instant, Vader's own sword is lit. Luke lunges, but Vader repels the blow. Again Luke attacks, and the swords of the two combatants clash in battle. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 101: Meet Me in the Hallway
item.itunes:summary: Luke ignites his sword in answer. In an instant, Vader's own sword is lit. Luke lunges, but Vader repels the blow. Again Luke attacks, and the swords of the two combatants clash in battle. Guest commentator: Songe Riddle

item.title: Empire Minute 100: Emperor Baby
item.description: Steam begins to build up in the chamber. Looking up through the steam, Luke sees a dark figure standing on a walkway above him. Luke holsters his gun and moves up the stairs to face Vader. He feels confident, eager to engage his enemy. Guest commentator: Meredith Woerner
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 100: Emperor Baby
item.itunes:summary: Steam begins to build up in the chamber. Looking up through the steam, Luke sees a dark figure standing on a walkway above him. Luke holsters his gun and moves up the stairs to face Vader. He feels confident, eager to engage his enemy. Guest commentator: Meredith Woerner
item.content:encoded: Steam begins to build up in the chamber. Looking up through the steam, Luke sees a dark figure standing on a walkway above him. Luke holsters his gun and moves up the stairs to face Vader. He feels confident, eager to engage his enemy. Guest commentator: Meredith Woerner

item.title: Empire Minute 99: It's A Trap!
item.description: Luke turns to see Leia, Chewie, Threepio, and Lando being herded down a second hallway by several other stormtroopers. Leia turns just in time to see Luke. Guest commentator: Meredith Woerner
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 99: It's A Trap!
item.itunes:summary: Luke turns to see Leia, Chewie, Threepio, and Lando being herded down a second hallway by several other stormtroopers. Leia turns just in time to see Luke. Guest commentator: Meredith Woerner

item.title: Empire Minute 98: Carbonite Coffin
item.description: As Luke and Artoo move carefully down a deserted corridor, they hear a group of people coming down a side hallway. Guest commentator: Meredith Woerner
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 98: Carbonite Coffin
item.itunes:summary: As Luke and Artoo move carefully down a deserted corridor, they hear a group of people coming down a side hallway. Guest commentator: Meredith Woerner
item.content:encoded: As Luke and Artoo move carefully down a deserted corridor, they hear a group of people coming down a side hallway. Guest commentator: Meredith Woerner

item.title: Empire Minute 97: The Sound of Love Dying
item.description: A huge mechanical tong lifts the steaming metal-encased space pirate out of the vat and stands him on the platform. Guest commentator: Meredith Woerner
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 97: The Sound of Love Dying
item.itunes:summary: A huge mechanical tong lifts the steaming metal-encased space pirate out of the vat and stands him on the platform. Guest commentator: Meredith Woerner
item.content:encoded: A huge mechanical tong lifts the steaming metal-encased space pirate out of the vat and stands him on the platform. Guest commentator: Meredith Woerner

item.title: Empire Minute 96: Fingerguns
item.description: Tears roll down Leia's face as she watches the dashing pirate walk to the hydraulic platform. Han looks one final time at his friends - and then, suddenly, the platform drops. Chewie howls. Leia turns away in agony. Guest commentator: Meredith Woerner
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 96: Fingerguns

item.title: Empire Minute 95: Chewie Freaks Out
item.description: Realizing what is about to happen, Chewie lets out a wild howl and attacks the stormtroopers surrounding Han. Guest commentator: Klee Wiggins
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 95: Chewie Freaks Out
item.itunes:summary: Realizing what is about to happen, Chewie lets out a wild howl and attacks the stormtroopers surrounding Han. Guest commentator: Klee Wiggins

item.title: Empire Minute 94: The String on a Balloon
item.description: Four armor-suited stormtroopers stand at the ready in the large chamber, which is filled with pipes and chemical tanks. In the middle of the room is a round pit housing a hydraulic platform. Darth Vader and Lando stand near the platform. Guest commentator: Klee Wiggins
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 94: The String on a Balloon

item.title: Empire Minute 93: Your Facility's Janky
item.description: Han hauls off and punches Lando. Guest commentator: Klee Wiggins
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 93: Your Facility's Janky
item.itunes:summary: Han hauls off and punches Lando. Guest commentator: Klee Wiggins
item.content:encoded: Han hauls off and punches Lando. Guest commentator: Klee Wiggins

item.title: Empire Minute 92: Where Was Leia?
item.description: Chewie helps Han to a platform and then turns as the door slides open revealing Leia. She, too, looks a little worse for wear. The troopers push her into the cell, and the door slides closed. She moves to Han, who is lying on the platform, and kneels next to him, gently stroking his head. Guest commentator: Klee Wiggins
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 92: Where Was Leia?

item.title: Empire Minute 91: Elevator Timing
item.description: Vader turns and sweeps into the elevator with Boba Fett. Lando walks swiftly down another corridor, muttering to himself. Guest commentator: Klee Wiggins
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 91: Elevator Timing
item.itunes:summary: Vader turns and sweeps into the elevator with Boba Fett. Lando walks swiftly down another corridor, muttering to himself. Guest commentator: Klee Wiggins

item.title: Empire Minute 90: I Think I Know A Secret
item.description: Darth Vader strides through the room as two stormtroopers prepare an elaborate torture mechanism. Han is strapped to a rack which tilts forward onto the torture device. Vader activates the mechanism, creating two bursts of sparks, one of which strikes Han's face. Guest commentator: Jeff Ayers
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 90: I Think I Know A Secret

Vader activates the mechanism, creating two bursts of sparks, one of which strikes Han's face. Guest commentator: Jeff Ayers

item.title: Empire Minute 89: Official Chewbacca Style
item.description: Chewbacca is in a Cloud City prison cell. The stark room is flooded with hot light. To add to Chewie's misery, a high-pitched whistle screeches loudly. Chewie is going mad. Guest commentator: Jeff Ayers

item.title: Empire Minute 88: The Vagaries of Stormtrooper Blaster Positions
item.description: The mighty doors to the dining room slide open and the group enters the dining room. At the far end of a huge banquet table sits Darth Vader. Standing at his side and slightly behind him is Boba Fett, the bounty hunter. Guest commentator: Jeff Ayers

item.title: Empire Minute 87: Lando Alarm
item.description: There is a buzz and the door slides open, revealing Lando. Guest commentator: Jeff Ayers

item.title: Empire Minute 86: More Mushy Bits
item.description: Within the quarters assigned her on Cloud City, Leia paces in agitation. She has changed from her cold-weather pants and jacket to a lovely dress. Her hair is down, tied back with ribbons. She moves from a large, open window and turns to see Han entering through the doorway. Guest commentator: Jeff Ayers

item.title: Empire Minute 84: The Minnesota Good-Bye

item.title: Empire Minute 83: There Are No Ghosts
item.description: In the bright lights of the fighter, Luke loads a heavy case into the belly of the ship. Artoo sits on top of the X-wing, settling down into his cubbyhole. Yoda stands nearby on a log. Guest commentator: Joseph Scrimshaw

item.title: Empire Minute 80: Persistent Wind
item.description: Lando moves threateningly toward Han. Suddenly, he throws his arms around his startled, long-lost friend and embraces him. Guest commentator: Joe Dator

item.title: Empire Minute 79: The New Jersey Thing
item.description: The clouds part to reveal a full view of the city as it bobs in and out of the cloud surface. The cloud cars and the Falcon head for the gleaming white metropolis. Guest commentator: Joe Dator

item.title: Empire Minute 78: Future Feelings

item.title: Empire Minute 77: Brown Stick
item.description: The two packing boxes and Artoo fall to the ground with a crash, then Luke himself tumbles over. Guest commentator: Joe Dator

item.title: Empire Minute 76: The Edge of the Matte
item.description: Hidden among the refuse, the Falcon tumbles away. In the next moment, the Avenger roars off into hyperspace. The Falcon's engines are ignited, and it races off into the distance. Amidst the slowly drifting junk, Boba Fett's ship appears and moves after the Falcon. Guest commentator: Joe Dator

item.title: Empire Minute 75: Competing Gravities
item.description: He points to a computer mapscreen on the control panel. Leia slips out of her chair and moves next to the handsome pilot. Small light points representing several systems flash by on the computer screen. Guest commentator: Stuart Wellington

item.title: Empire Minute 74: Down in the Pit
item.description: Clutching desperately at his throat, Captain Needa slumps down, then falls over on his back, at the feet of Darth Vader. Two stormtroopers pick up the lifeless body and carry it quickly away as Admiral Piett and two of his captains hurry up to the Dark Lord. Guest commentator: Stuart Wellington

item.title: Empire Minute 73: Lozenge After Lozenge
item.description: The entire X-wing moves majestically, surely, toward the shore. Yoda stands on a tree root and guides the fighter carefully down toward the beach. Luke stares in astonishment as the fighter settles down onto the shore. Guest commentator: Stuart Wellington

item.title: Empire Minute 72: Magic Tinkle

item.itunes:summary: Luke shakes his head. Guest commentator: Stuart Wellington

item.title: Empire Minute 70: Yoda's Greatest Hits
item.description: Luke closes his eyes and concentrates on thinking the ship out. Slowly, the X-wing's nose begins to rise above the water. It hovers for a moment and then slides back, disappearing once again. Guest commentator: Chris Radtke

item.title: Empire Minute 69: His Most Grover Moment
item.description: Luke concentrates on trying to lift the top rock. It rises a few feet, shaking under the strain. But, distracted by Artoo's frantic beeping, Luke loses his balance and finally collapses. Yoda jumps clear. Guest commentator: Chris Radtke

item.title: Empire Minute 68: M'Kae
item.description: The tiny Falcon heads directly for the Avenger's bridge. The Imperials stationed there are stunned to see the small spaceship racing low across the hull, headed directly at the huge windows of the bridge area. Alarms go off everywhere. The Destroyer's commander, Captain Needa, can scarcely believe his eyes. Guest commentator: Chris Radtke

item.title: Empire Minute 67: C-3PO's Big Book of Odds
item.description: Han pulls back on the hyperspace throttle and -- nothing happens. Flak bursts continue to rock the ship. Guest commentator: Chris Radtke

item.title: Empire Minute 66: Space Killers
item.description: Vader stands in the back control area of his ship's bridge with a motley group of men and creatures. Admiral Piett and two controllers stand at the front of the bridge and watch the group with scorn. Guest commentator: Chris Radtke
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 66: Space Killers

item.title: Empire Minute 65: The Billy Madison of the Jedi
item.description: Then, a loud hiss! Darth Vader appears across the blackness, illuminated by his own just-ignited laser sword. Immediately, he charges Luke, saber held high. He is upon the youth in seconds, but Luke sidesteps perfectly and slashes at Vader with his sword. Guest commentator: Mike Dawson

item.title: Empire Minute 64: The Magic Tree and the Evil Cave
item.description: Luke moves into the almost total darkness of the wet and slimy cave. The youth can barely make out the edge of the passage. Holding his lit saber before him, he sees a lizard crawling up the side of the cave and a snake wrapped around the branches of a tree. Luke draws a deep breath, then pushes deeper into the cave. Guest commentator: Mike Dawson

item.title: Empire Minute 63: Yoda's Funhouse
item.description: Breathing heavily, he takes his shirt from a nearby tree branch and pulls it on. He turns to see a huge, dead, black tree, its base surrounded by a few feet of water. Giant, twisted roots form a dark and sinister cave on one side. Luke stares at the tree, trembling. Guest commentator: Mike Dawson

item.title: Empire Minute 62: No Why
item.description: With Yoda strapped to his back, Luke climbs up one of the many thick vines that grow in the swamp. Panting heavily, he continues his course -- climbing, flipping through the air, jumping over roots, and racing in and out of the heavy ground fog. Guest commentator: Mike Dawson

item.title: Empire Minute 61: Working It Out with the Worm
item.description: The Millennium Falcon, zooming through the monster's mouth, rolls on its side and barely makes it between two of the gigantic white teeth before the huge jaws slams closed. Guest commentator: Mike Dawson

item.title: Empire Minute 60: Dot Org
item.description: He unholsters his blaster and fires at the far side of the huge cave. The cavern begins to shake and the ground starts to buckle. Guest commentator: Tony Consiglio
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 60: Dot Org

item.title: Empire Minute 59: Prisoner of the Mynocks
item.description: Chewie barks through his face mask, and points toward the ship's cockpit. A five-foot-long shape can be seen moving across the top of the Falcon. The leathery creature lets out a screech as Han blasts it with a laser bolt. Guest commentator: Tony Consiglio

item.title: Empire Minute 58: Flying Suction Cups
item.description: Princess Leia sits in the pilot's seat. She runs her hand across the control panel as she thinks of Han and the confusion he has created within her. Suddenly, something outside the cockpit window catches her eye. The reflection of the panel lights obscures her vision until a soft suctionlike cup attaches itself to the windscreen. Guest commentator: Tony Consiglio

item.title: Empire Minute 57: The Physical Yoda
item.description: Yoda turns his piercing gaze on Luke, as though the Jedi Master's huge eyes could somehow determine how much the boy had learned. After a long moment, the little Jedi turns toward where he alone sees Ben. Guest commentator: Tony Consiglio

item.title: Empire Minute 56: Rumspringa
item.description: The boy is bewildered, but it gradually dawns on him that the little creature is Yoda, the Jedi Master, and that he is speaking with Ben. Guest commentator: Tony Consiglio

item.title: Empire Minute 55: Pulling Reverse Ozzels
item.description: Moving with some difficulty in the cramped quarters, Luke sits down near the fire and serves himself from the pot. Tasting the unfamiliar concoction, he is pleasantly surprised. Guest commentator: Ryan Haupt

item.title: Empire Minute 54: Emperor Chimp-Eyes
item.description: A twelve-foot hologram of the Galactic Emperor materializes before Vader. The Emperor's dark robes and monk's hood are reminiscent of the cloak worn by Ben Kenobi. His voice is even deeper and more frightening than Vader's. Guest commentator: Ryan Haupt

item.title: Empire Minute 52: Scoundrels
item.description: He kisses her now, with slow, hot lips. He takes his time, as though he had forever, bending her body backward. She has never been kissed like this before, and it almost makes her faint. Guest commentator: Ryan Haupt

item.description: Luke pulls an equipment box from the shore to the clearing. He ignites a little fusion furnace and warms his hands before it. Taking a power cable, he plugs it into Artoo's noselike socket. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton

item.title: Empire Minute 46: Not Entirely Stable
item.description: The pirate starship rests in a dark, dripping asteroid cave. It is so dark that the cave's exact dimensions are impossible to determine. Guest commentator: Tony Thaxton

item.title: Empire Minute 45: Veiny White Worm-Man
item.description: Admiral Piett hesitates in the entryway to Vader's private cubicle. After a moment, he steps into the room and pauses at the surprising sight before him. Guest commentators: Dan McCoy and Elliott Kalan

item.title: Empire Minute 44: Failing Upwards
item.description: The runt-size robot is spit out of the water, makes a graceful arc, and comes crashing down into a patch of soft gray moss. Guest commentators: Dan McCoy and Elliott Kalan

item.title: Empire Minute 43: Intergalactic Idiot

item.title: Empire Minute 42: RoboCamels
item.description: Suddenly, there is a cracking sound as if limbs were being broken off trees and then a tremendous jolt as the spacecraft stops. Luke pulls a switch and his canopy pops open. Guest commentators: Dan McCoy and Elliott Kalan

item.title: Empire Minute 41: Beep Boop
item.description: The Falcon races down into the crater. The walls are barely visible as the ship speed through the tunnel-like opening. A small cave appears on one side of the crater, and the Falcon turns, slows, and scoots into it. Guest commentators: Dan McCoy and Elliott Kalan

item.title: Empire Minute 40: Look for the Potato
item.description: The TIE fighters approach the Falcon, but a giant asteroid hurtles directly into their path. As the asteroid continues on its way, it leaves remains of the two exploded TIE fighters to tumble into deep space. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider

item.title: Empire Minute 39: The Odds
item.description: The Falcon turns into the asteroid storm and as the ship completes its turn, asteroids start coming straight at the cockpit windows. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider

item.title: Empire Minute 38: Captain Scrapey
item.description: The Millennium Falcon races away from the colliding Star Destroyers, still followed by four TIE fighters. Laser bolts spark the pitch-black skies. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 38: Captain Scrapey
item.itunes:summary: The Millennium Falcon races away from the colliding Star Destroyers, still followed by four TIE fighters. Laser bolts spark the pitch-black skies. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider

item.title: Empire Minute 37: Artooish
item.description: Luke, looking thoughtful, suddenly makes a decision. He flips several switches. The stars shift as he takes his fighter into a steep turn. The X-wing banks sharply and flies away in a new direction. The monitor screen on Luke's control panel prints out a question from the concerned Artoo. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider

item.title: Empire Minute 36: The Fonz's Playbook
item.description: Hearing the loud roar of the Millennium Falcon's engines, Vader looks toward the main hangar doors just in time to see the Falcon lift up and disappear outside the cave. Guest commentator: Tim Kreider
item.itunes:title: Empire Minute 36: The Fonz's Playbook

item.title: Empire Minute 35: His Zip-It Finger
item.description: Chewie lets out a relieved shriek at seeing Han and Leia running toward the ship. The Wookiee runs out into the falling ice, lets out a howl, then runs up the ship's ramp. Han and Leia run up the ramp after him, closely followed by Threepio. Guest commentator: Mike Norton

item.title: Empire Minute 34: May Contain Wampas
item.description: Inside his walker, General Veers prepares to fire on the Rebel power generators. Guest commentator: Mike Norton

item.itunes:summary: Inside his walker, General Veers prepares to fire on the Rebel power generators. Guest commentator: Mike Norton

item.title: Empire Minute 33: Poop Hatch
item.description: The walker's giant feet continue to pound onward across the frozen snow. Stray laser bolts whistle by Luke as he climbs up the cable to the walker's hull, reaching a small hatch. Hanging precariously, Luke cuts the solid metal hatch with his laser sword. Guest commentator: Mike Norton

Guest commentator: Mike Norton

item.title: Empire Minute 32: Rebellion 1st, Conservation 2nd
item.description: Han hurries into the command center. It is a shambles, but some people are still at their posts. As he enters, a gigantic cave-in almost obliterates the room. He finds Leia and Threepio near one of the control boards. Guest commentator: Mike Norton

item.title: Empire Minute 31: Daft Punk
item.description: Desperately, Luke works the controls of his flak-buffeted ship. Suddenly, the speeder is rocked by a huge explosion. Luke struggles with the controls with a look of terror on his face. The speeder fills with smoke, and electrical sparks jump about the cockpit. Guest commentator: Mike Norton

item.title: Empire Minute 30: Everything's Where It Should Be
item.description: Muffled distant explosions create widening cracks in the ice roof of the hangar. Trying to ignore the noise and falling bits of snow, Han works on one of the Falcon's lifters while Chewie works on one of the wings. Guest commentator: Adam Santiago

item.title: Empire Minute 22: The Wookiee Word for Fire
item.description: Pilots, gunners, and R2 units scurry about. Luke, pulling on his heavy-weather jacket, is headed toward a row of armored speeders. He stops at the rear of the Millennium Falcon, where Han and Chewie are trying to repair the right lifter with even more haste than before. Guest commentator: Damon Ciarelli

item.title: Empire Minute 21: Pits Full of Men
item.description: Darth Vader's Star Destroyer, larger and more awesome than the five Imperial Star Destroyers that surround it, sits in the vastness of space. Guest commentator: Damon Ciarelli

item.title: Empire Minute 20: Executorized
item.description: The probe droid has spotted Chewbacca who, not thirty feet away, has popped his head over a snow bank. Instantly, the probe robot swings around, its deadly ray ready to fire. But before it can get a shot off, it is hit from behind by a laser bolt, and explodes in a million pieces. Guest commentator: Asterios Kokkinos

item.title: Empire Minute 19: Space Turkey

item.title: Empire Minute 18: Laser Brain
item.description: Leia leans over and kisses Luke on the lips. Then she turns on her heel and walks out, leaving everyone in the room slightly dumbstruck. With some smugness, Luke puts his hands behind his head and grins. Suddenly, in the distance, the muffled sound of an alarm is heard. Guest commentator: Asterios Kokkinos

item.title: Empire Minute 17: In the Bacta Tank
item.description: Strange robot surgeons adjust a mass of electronic equipment. A switch is thrown and a sudden blinding flash obscures Luke in a bacta tank filled with a thick, gelatinous slime. He begins to thrash about, raving in delirium. Guest commentator: Asterios Kokkinos
